nodes.text: The clone heavy troopers, or anti-air clone troopers were heavy weapons specialists, Advanced Recon Commandos in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars, albeit of unknown relation to ARC heavy gunners. Some Commanders, such as Commander Bacara, were equipped with clone heavy trooper armor such as the cheek plating, and Kamas.

The heavy weapons commandos carried Merr-Sonn PLX-1 portable missile launchers, blaster pistols, V-1 thermal detonators, HX2 antipersonnel mines and other ARC trooper equipment. The heavy troopers handled the anti-vehicle, anti-airborne, and anti-armor duties of the Grand Army of the Republic. The units were not as resilient as AT-TEs or LAATs but offered ground units some protection against air attacks.
They should not be confused with the clone heavy gunner.

In Star Wars: Battlefront II the clone soldiers called "heavy troopers" wore armor very similar to that of Commander Bacara of the Galactic Marines, making some confusion that heavy troopers were a division of the Galactic Marines. Clone Commander Bacara's helmet was similar to that of a clone heavy trooper.
